title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt and garam masala
2. Grill or bake chicken until cooked through
3. In a separate skillet, sauté garlic, ginger, and onion until softened
4. Add tomato sauce and cream to the skillet
5. Slice cooked chicken and add to the sauce
6. Simmer for 10-15 minutes
7. Serve over rice

title: Pizza Margherita
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C)
2. Stretch out the pizza dough
3. Spread the tomato sauce over the dough
4. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce
5. Add fresh basil leaves
6. Drizzle with olive oil
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown
8. Slice and serve

title: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: 1. Sauté chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until softened
2. Add chopped tomatoes and vegetable broth to the pot
3. Simmer for 20-25 minutes
4. Puree the soup until smooth
5. Stir in chopped fresh basil and cream
6. Season with salt and black pepper
7. Serve hot

title: Title
instructions: Hello

title: Salmon Avocado Roll
instructions: 1. Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat
2. Spread sushi rice evenly over the nori
3. Place thin slices of salmon and avocado along one edge of the rice
4. Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat
5. Slice into bite-sized pieces
6. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
2. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy
3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper
4. Drain spaghetti and add to the skillet with bacon
5. Quickly stir in the egg mixture until the spaghetti is coated
6. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan cheese

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar until light

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1. Brown the ground beef in a skillet
2. Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning
3. Warm the tortillas in a separate skillet
4. Fill each tortilla with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa
5. Fold the tortillas and serve immediately

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Slice beef thinly and marinate in soy sauce and sesame oil
2. Blanch broccoli florets in boiling water
3. In a wok, stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant
4. Add beef to the wok and stir-fry until browned
5. Add blanched broccoli and oyster sauce to the wok
6. Stir-fry until heated through
7. Serve over rice

title: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Chop lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and red onion
2. Place chopped vegetables in a large bowl
3. Add Kalamata olives and crumbled feta cheese
4. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad
5. Sprinkle with dried oregano
6. Toss gently to combine
7. Serve immediately

title: Turkey Club Sandwich
instructions: 1. Cook bacon until crispy
2. Toast bread slices until golden brown
3. Spread mayonnaise on one side of each bread slice
4. Layer turkey breast, bacon, lettuce, and tomato between two slices of bread
5. Cut sandwich in half diagonally
6. Serve immediately
